Class CreateStrings

java.lang.Object
ReadInData
CreateStrings
public class CreateStrings extends ReadInData
CreateStrings class creates strings of postiive and negative reviews aswell as comparing reviews with positive and negative words.

  • Method Details

    • CreatePosStrings

      public Hashtable<String,String[]> CreatePosStrings(File[] fileNames, String directory, Hashtable<Integer,String> pos, Hashtable<Integer,String> neg) throws FileNotFoundException
      CreatePosStrings method creates a HashTable for positive review filenames and string array of review content strings.
      Parameters:
      fileNames - Takes in ArrayofFileNames.
      directory - location of positivereviews
      pos - Hashtable containing count and positive words.
      neg - Hashtable containing count and negative words.
      Returns:
      Hashtabke of review filenames and array of strings of reviews.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - when the file is not found

    • CreateNegStrings

      public Hashtable<String,String[]> CreateNegStrings(File[] fileNames, String directory, Hashtable<Integer,String> pos, Hashtable<Integer,String> neg) throws FileNotFoundException

      Parameters:
      fileNames - Takes in ArrayofFileNames.
      directory - location of negative reviews
      pos - Hashtable containing count and positive words.
      neg - Hashtable containing count and negative words.
      Returns:
      Hashtable of review filenames and array of strings of reviews.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - when the file is not found

    • comparePositive

      public int comparePositive(Hashtable<String,String[]> HT, Hashtable<Integer,String> HTP, Hashtable<Integer,String> HTN)
      Compares positive string arrays reviews with positive and negative words.
      Parameters:
      HT - hashtable of reviews name and array of strings of their reviews.
      HTP - hashtable of positive words.
      HTN - hashtable of negative words.
      Returns:
      number positive reviews classified as postiive.
